verbs.description: If [ARG1: Arron Banks] [V: is] [ARG2: a punchy , thick - skinned man , who loves a scrap , adores being provocative on Twitter and will never walk away from a fight] , Katya trumps him ten times over .

If Arron Banks is [ARG0: a punchy , thick - skinned man] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: loves] [ARG1: a scrap] , adores being provocative on Twitter and will never walk away from a fight , Katya trumps him ten times over .

If Arron Banks is [ARG0: a punchy , thick - skinned man] , [R-ARG0: who] loves a scrap , [V: adores] [ARG1: being provocative on Twitter] and will never walk away from a fight , Katya trumps him ten times over .

If Arron Banks is a punchy , thick - skinned man , [ARG1: who] loves a scrap , adores [V: being] [ARG2: provocative] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] and will never walk away from a fight , Katya trumps him ten times over .
If Arron Banks is a punchy , thick - skinned man , who loves a scrap , adores being provocative on Twitter and [V: will] never walk away from a fight , Katya trumps him ten times over .

If Arron Banks is [ARG0: a punchy , thick - skinned man] , [R-ARG0: who] loves a scrap , adores being provocative on Twitter and [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: never] [V: walk] [ARGM-DIR: away] [ARG1: from a fight] , Katya trumps him ten times over .
